content: pm p2 k2 2 times row 2 ws p2 k2 2 times sm p5 p2togtbl p3 yo p3 yo p3 p2tog p5 sm p to next marker sm k2 p2 2 times row 3 k2 p2 2 times sm k to marker sm k4 k2tog k3 yo k5 yo k3 ssk k4 sm p2 k2 2 times row 4 p2 k2 2 times sm p3 p2togtbl p3 yo p7 yo p3 p2tog p3 sm p to next marker sm k2 p2 2 times row 5 k2 p2 2 times sm k to marker sm k2 k2tog k3 yo k9 yo k3 ssk k2 sm p2 k2 2 times row 6 p2 k2 2 times sm p1 p2togtbl p3 yo p11 yo p3 p2tog p1 sm p to next marker sm k2 p2 2 times repeat row 1-6 a total of 86 times or until desired length ensuring that you have enough yarn for the rib border rib border end remove stitch markers on row 1 as you come to them row 1 rs * k2 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 2 ws * p2 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 work row 1 & 2 11 times more 24 row total bind off on rs in pattern finishing sew in ends on the inside of the ribbed selvedge stitches and block according to the dimensions press the ribbed border out for an even rectangular wrap © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only fiori | page 4 chart schematic © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
